TEXT.TITLE: USDA DETAILS FREE GRAIN STOCKS UNDER LOAN
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Agriculture Department gave projected carryover free stocks of feedgrains, corn and wheat under loans, with comparisons, as follows, in mln bushels, except feedgrains, which is in mln tonnes -- 1986/87 1985/86 04/09/87 03/09/87 04/09/87 03/09/87 Under Regular Nine Month Loan -- WHEAT 225 300 678 678 FEEDGRAINS 52.1 68.1 75.7 75.7 CORN 1,800 2,400 2,589 2,589 Special Producer Storage Loan Program -- WHEAT 165 150 163 163 FEEDGRAINS 7.0 6.7 5.3 5.3 CORN 200 200 147 147 Reuter
